hello, i'm kels, the webmaster of this site. i am graduating with a B.S. in computer science. i'm a software engineer with my hands in: fintech, research, fullstack

this site is just for me to have fun and share things.

my displinary interests include: games, technological accessibility issues, ethics, complex systems, information science, and all things esolangs and compilers. i am trying to learn functional programming but i fear i am not smart enough.

currently playing with: rust, haskell, dynamic programming, making plugins for obsidian, my own esolang

i also enjoy casual stamp collecting, stationary, postcrossing, trains, drawing, zine making, analog photography, rock climbing, and crochet.
